name: Space Doomer
description:
"Space Doomer" is a 2D arcade game. The main goal of which is to kill all the enemies on the field and get points.

A LONG TIME AGO, PEOPLE MOVED TO MARS IN SEARCH OF NEW RESOURCES FOR EXISTENCE.
THE ALIEN RACES WERE NOT HAPPY WITH PEOPLE. THEY DECIDED TO TAKE OVER THE EMPIRE.
YOU ARE THE ONLY ONE WHO CAN SAVE THE EMPIRE.

Game Features:
  • 55 levels with increasing difficulty
  • Unusual gameplay
  • Pixel art graphics
  • Cyberpunk style
  • Retrowave music
